LoginOIDC.SettingDisableDirectLoginUrlHelp: When checked, users have to inititate the login via the Matomo login page. Otherwise the login button can be embedded in third-party services.
LoginOIDC.SettingAllowSignup: Create new users when users try to log in with unknown OIDC accounts
LoginOIDC.SettingBypassTwoFa: Disable second factor when sign in with OIDC
LoginOIDC.SettingAuthenticationNameHelp: Name of the authentication source which will be displayed on the login screen.
LoginOIDC.SettingEndSessionUrlHelp: After logging out, the user is redirected to this URL to end the session at the provider. If you are unsure, just leave this field empty.
LoginOIDC.SettingUserinfoIdHelp: Name of the unique user id field in the userinfo response. Usually for OpenID Connect services like Auth0 this is 'sub'. Github provides the user id in 'id'.
LoginOIDC.SettingRedirectUriOverrideHelp: In some cases it might be useful to manipulate the redirect uri which is given to the OpenID Connect provider. If you are unsure, just leave this field empty.
LoginOIDC.SettingAllowedSignupDomainsHelp: List of email domains which should be allowed to create new accounts. Multiple domains have to be separated by line breaks. When empty, any email domain will be accepted.
LoginOIDC.OIDCIntro: This allows you to sign in using an external authentication service.
LoginOIDC.AccountLinked: Your account is currently linked (Remote User ID: %1$s).
LoginOIDC.AccountNotLinked: Your account is currently not linked.
LoginOIDC.ExceptionNotConfigured: LoginOIDC has not been configured yet.
LoginOIDC.ExceptionUserNotFoundAndSignupDisabled: User not found. OAuth registrations are disabled.
LoginOIDC.ExceptionUserNotFoundAndNoEmail: User not found. User could not be created because the OAuth service did not return an email address.
LoginOIDC.ExceptionAllowedSignupDomainsValidationF: Validation failed for the list of domains allowed for user creation.
LoginOIDC.ExceptionAllowedSignupDomainsDenied: The domain is currently not activated for account creation.
LoginOIDC.ExceptionAlreadyLinkedToDifferentAccount: The remote OAuth user is already linked to another account.
